programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Mandy learns that Michael had a part to play in Tobias breaking up with her. Alex chases down a new lead in an attempt to get closer to the truth surrounding Suguna's death. Benny unintentionally gives Violet false hopes about staying in Melvin's house permanently.

programme.title: The Old Man & the Gun
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S18
programme.desc: With an astronomical number of loyal fans eager to find out what's in store, judges Simon Cowell, Howie Mandel, Heidi Klum and Sofia Vergara - and host Terry Crews - are back with more diverse talent and show-stopping moments than ever before. With contestants of all backgrounds and ages competing for the life-changing, million dollar prize, we follow the hopeful performers, from singers and dancers to comedians, magicians and more, on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Carabao Cup 2024/25 (Round of 16): Brighton vs Liverpool
programme.desc: The Carabao Cup is the showpiece cup competition of the English Football League (EFL) and an annual knockout competition in men's domestic football in England featuring clubs from the EFL and Premier League.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Dribble Like Fandi
programme.desc: Ryan Lee needs a pair of new football boots. A mysterious Karung guni man appears to give him a pair - one with secret powers. Ryan and his best friend Arthur thinks this could be football legend Fandi Ahmad's old boots. With the special boots, can they lead their team the Punggol Pumas to the top of the championship table?

programme.title: Mush-Mush & The Mushables Part 2
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out. Worried, Mushpot explains to our friends that the Tree of Life, that regenerate the entire forest, is dying! There is only one Mushable who could help Mushpot to save the forest: Starmush. But the Mushelders haven't gotten along for years. Will they be able to put their differences aside in order to save the Tree of Life before it's too late?

programme.title: Porong Porong Rescue Mission
programme.desc: When pirates come to their snowy village, Pororo the penguin and Eddy the fox work together and figure out a way to rescue their animal friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Mighty Express Specials
programme.desc: Catching a ride with the 'Mighty Express', a team of trains and their kid-friends who go on exciting adventures and overcome trouble on the tracks with quick thinking and teamwork.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures
programme.desc: In his latest set of adventures, Andy travels to all corners of the globe, meeting an amazing new cast of animals - from chameleons in Sri Lanka to emperor penguins in Antarctica. Accompanied by tech wizard Jen and new information-seeking AI Scout, Andy travels the globe in a hi-tech expedition truck, a scientific research station that houses Jen's database of incredible facts about fauna and flora that inhabit our planet. In each episode, the team are sent on a mission by HQ to solve a puzzle.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Luggy
programme.desc: Just as Zippy is about to meet his doom, a familiar voice calls out to him in the distance. Harry and Sully are attacked in their faces and before long, more backup has arrived at the doorstep to save the luggages and their friends! However, everyone is startled when Harry and Sully gets away scot-free. Luggy, Zippy and DJ Blaze eventually team up to make sure that justice is met.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: The Space Race
programme.desc: Reach for the stars with Show Commander Afro as he pilots you through The Space Race, the intergalactic game show testing contestants for their knowledge of space and their ingenuity in a series of challenging tasks. 12-teams, made up of a young captain and their first officer, vie to win a prize of a lifetime; a trip to New York to feel like a real-life astronaut in the ZERO-G Experience.

programme.title: 阿贤这么吃 S2
programme.desc: 《阿贤这么吃2 》走入庄园探寻马来西亚产制优质食材，看看各路生产者如何深耕在地物产，从咖啡、牛奶、鱼肉、蔬菜、鸡肉、发酵物到食用菌菇，还有我们刻板印象中唯有欧洲产才属优质品的起司、无花果、鱼子酱与巧克力等等，都将全然是马来西亚在地风土孕育的物产。阿贤也请教餐厅主厨如何将多元多样的风土食材，烹制成日常餐桌上的美味风景线，让土地与餐桌产生紧密连结，且透过不停梳理、复刻与重现，形塑马来西亚饮食的新在地。.

programme.title: 空中访民情 2024

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 顾九思想不到柳玉茹那么厉害的一个人，也有担心紧张的时候。于是，顾九思给柳玉茹留下锦囊妙计，对顾家掌柜逐个击破，竟一一奏效。柳玉茹对待这笔生意十分上心，她亲自选品，在徉州街头奔走，四处比价。带来的样品让周烨十分满意，她与周烨约定好了相见时间。然而签约当天却恒生变故，周烨告诉柳玉茹，有一个叫洛子商的商人也给他送来了样品，货款比顾家低两成半，交货时间却还早了一个月。.

programme.title: 御赐小仵作
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 讲述了唐中晚期，来自西南山区仵作世家的少女楚楚，为实现梦想独自来长安闯荡，参加仵作考试，遇到断案如神的安郡王萧瑾瑜。萧瑾瑜召集楚楚、景翊、冷月等人作为搭档揭秘探案。伴随着一个个的案件破解，团队一步步揭开谜底，最终破解了一场延续十八年的惊天大案的故事。.
